definitions.definition: A tall annual dioecious plant ( Cannabis , especially Cannabis sativa ), native to central Asia and having alternate, palmately divided leaves and tough bast fibers.
A mildly euphoriant or sedating , intoxicating hallucinogenic drug prepared from various parts of this plant.
The purified and decarboxylated resin of the cannabis plant used for medicinal purposes rather than for any intoxicating effects.

main_definition: A tall annual dioecious plant ( Cannabis , especially Cannabis sativa ), native to central Asia and having alternate, palmately divided leaves and tough bast fibers.
secondary_definitions: A mildly euphoriant or sedating , intoxicating hallucinogenic drug prepared from various parts of this plant.
The purified and decarboxylated resin of the cannabis plant used for medicinal purposes rather than for any intoxicating effects.
